snippet.title: Commodore Plus/4 - Torpedo Alley
snippet.description:
Me playing Torpedo Alley on Commodore Plus/4 - 1986 
Some sort of submarine simulator for the Commodore Plus/4. Actually a really boring game. There were a few shitty (sorry) games released for the C16 & Plus/4. And Torpedo Alley is surely one of them.
Anyway I wanted to broadcast it to you. ;-)

The aim of the game is very simple. Sink the ships and this underwater device (whatever it is). Don't get hit by airplanes, watch your battery. And on top of this the game has a time limit. Which is actually the only good thing in this game. ;-)
